code:
class Solution:
    def minMaxSubarraySum(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        lSmall = [-1]*n
        rSmall = [n]*n
        stack = []
        for i in range(n):
            while stack and nums[stack[-1]]>nums[i]:
                stack.pop()
            lSmall[i] = stack[-1] if stack else -1
            stack.append(i)
        stack.clear()
        for i in range(n-1,-1,-1):
            while stack and nums[stack[-1]]>=nums[i]:
                stack.pop()
            rSmall[i] = stack[-1] if stack else n
            stack.append(i)
        def countSub(L,R,k):
            if L==0 or R==0:
                return 0
            m = k - 1
            if (L - 1)+(R - 1) <= m:
                return L*R
            X = min(L,m+1)
            x0 = max(0,m - (R-1))
            s = 0
            if x0>0:
                t = min(x0,X)
                s += t*R
            if x0< X:
                start = max(x0,0)
                end = X
                c = (end - start)
                s += c*(m+1) - (start+end-1)*c//2
            return s
        totalMin = 0
        for i in range(n):
            L = i - lSmall[i]
            R = rSmall[i] - i
            totalMin += nums[i]*countSub(L,R,k)
        lBig = [-1]*n
        rBig = [n]*n
        stack.clear()
        for i in range(n):
            while stack and nums[stack[-1]]<nums[i]:
                stack.pop()
            lBig[i] = stack[-1] if stack else -1
            stack.append(i)
        stack.clear()
        for i in range(n-1,-1,-1):
            while stack and nums[stack[-1]]<=nums[i]:
                stack.pop()
            rBig[i] = stack[-1] if stack else n
            stack.append(i)
        totalMax = 0
        for i in range(n):
            L = i - lBig[i]
            R = rBig[i] - i
            totalMax += nums[i]*countSub(L,R,k)
        return totalMin + totalMax
